overview: Pushed by his mother Agrippina, Neron seized power at the expense of Britannicus.  His poetry makes him commit numerous crimes.  He will die stabbed after having killed his wife, his mother, his advisers, his wife's lovers, and an incredible number of Christians ...
tagline: His towering misdeeds wrote his name in letters of fire among history's most terrifying pages.
title: Nero and the Burning of Rome
